long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current Version Features:

Our Chrome extension is a powerful tool for Twitter users, allowing you to effortlessly generate screenshots of Tweets and Threads. With just a single click, you can capture your Twitter activity, be it an individual Tweet or an entire Thread, and easily generate high-quality screenshots. This feature is perfect for users who need to quickly share or save Twitter content.

Future Version Features:

In future versions, we will introduce more powerful features to enhance your Twitter experience.

Assist in Polishing Tweets and Threads: We understand that crafting engaging Tweets and Threads is not always easy. Therefore, our extension will include a robust polishing tool that can help you improve your Twitter content, making it more appealing and impactful. Whether you're looking to boost your Twitter influence or simply express your thoughts more effectively, this feature will be your powerful ally.

Assist in Splitting Tweets Exceeding Length Limit: Twitter's character limit can sometimes hinder us from fully expressing our thoughts. To address this, our extension will include an intelligent splitting tool that can automatically divide Tweets exceeding the length limit into multiple consecutive Tweets. This way, you can write your thoughts worry-free, and let our extension handle the character limit issue for you.

Our goal is to make Twitter more user-friendly, enabling everyone to share and receive information more effectively. Look forward to our future versions, where we will bring you more innovative and practical features.

=================================================

现在的版本功能：

我们的Chrome插件是Twitter用户的强大工具，它可以让你轻松地生成Tweet和Thread的截图。只需一键，你就可以捕捉你的Twitter动态，无论是单个Tweet还是整个Thread，都可以轻松生成高质量的截图。这个功能非常适合需要快速分享或保存Twitter内容的用户。

未来的版本功能：

在未来的版本中，我们将引入更多强大的功能来提升你的Twitter体验。

辅助润色Tweet和Thread： 我们知道，写出引人入胜的Tweet和Thread并不容易。因此，我们的插件将包含一个强大的润色工具，它可以帮助你改进你的Twitter内容，使其更具吸引力和影响力。无论你是想提升你的Twitter影响力，还是只是想更好地表达你的想法，这个功能都将是你的得力助手。

辅助拆分超出长度限制的Tweet： Twitter的字符限制有时会阻碍我们充分表达我们的想法。为了解决这个问题，我们的插件将包含一个智能拆分工具，它可以自动将超出长度限制的Tweet拆分成多个连续的Tweet。这样，你就可以无忧无虑地写下你的想法，让我们的插件帮你处理字符限制的问题。

我们的目标是让Twitter变得更加用户友好，让每个人都能更好地分享和接收信息。请期待我们的未来版本，我们将为你带来更多创新和实用的功能。
